housingCrisis.title: Housing Crisis
housingCrisis.description: Ontario is short over 50,000 affordable homes. Backyard suites add options—without building new towers.

familySupport.title: Family Support
familySupport.description: Aging parents or adult kids can live independently, just steps from home.

rentalIncome.title: Rental Income
rentalIncome.description: Backyard suites can bring in $1,500–$2,000/month in long-term rent.

risingCosts.title: Rising Costs
risingCosts.description: Families are being priced out—backyard units are a more accessible solution.

legalChanges.title: Legal Changes
legalChanges.description: Many Ontario cities now allow backyard suites by right. No zoning battle required.

smartGrowth.title: Smart Growth
smartGrowth.description: It's local, sustainable, and makes better use of land we already have.

meetLandseed.subtitle: MEET LANDSEED: YOUR GUIDE IN THE PROCESS

whatIs.title: WHAT IS LANDSEED?
whatIs.description: LandSeed is a non-profit organization. We are a team of community-first development consultants connecting property owners, builders, lenders, and city officials. We guide homeowners through planning and construction to build backyard suites that serve their goals—whether it's creating rental income, welcoming guests, or housing loved ones.

whatMakesDifferent.title: WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT?
whatMakesDifferent.description: LandSeed is a community-first consulting team with hands-on zoning and legal expertise. We are diverse and have experience working across cultures and preferences. Our mindset is collaborative, patient, and client-first. We aim to provide a tailor-made experience from early planning all the way to project completion.

unlockPotential.subtitle: WE DON'T JUST BUILD.
unlockPotential.title: WE UNLOCK POTENTIAL.
unlockPotential.description: At LandSeed, we help everyday homeowners turn backyard ideas into real, livable spaces. We guide you through zoning, design, permits, and construction — without jargon or stress.

susan.name: Susan
susan.quote: We built a suite for Mom—now she has her own space, and we have peace of mind.

leo.name: Leo
leo.quote: My office is just 20 steps from my kitchen. This is the best decision that I made for my business.
leo.description: Building a career from his backyard.

maya.name: Maya
maya.quote: We now earn $1,500/month renting to a long-term tenant.
maya.description: Turning a yard into monthly income.

video1.title: Unlock the potential with thoughtful design
video1.description: Built and insulated to handle the temperatures of both Canadian Winters, and US Summers. We have customization options for interior features, exterior features, and auxiliary features.
